project_main_text.text: A page build project set during my Masters in Web Design at Greenwich University. ‘Bicycle Doctor’, a workers co-op based in Rusholme, South Manchester, had a very badly designed and structured website. The brief was to re-design the home page of the website, as well as propose a re-structure. I wanted to create a design that echoed the feel and ethics of their business, being a bike workshop, as opposed to a slick and trendy bike shop.
